name: K8s Test Env
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y docker.io curl git && curl -Lo kind https://kind.sigs.k8s.io/dl/v0.21.0/kind-linux-amd64 && chmod +x kind && sudo mv kind /usr/local/bin/ && curl -LO https://dl.k8s.io/release/$(curl -L -s https://dl.k8s.io/release/stable.txt)/bin/linux/amd64/kubectl && chmod +x kubectl && sudo mv kubectl /usr/local/bin/
